SEARCH

Class Vending

java.lang.Object
AbstractVending
Vending
public class Vending extends AbstractVending
This interacts with the vending view class and gives the values for it to print. It also performs various methods that refer to the action of the vending machine. It inherits the attributes and methods of the AbstractVending class. It contains the variable created as an attribute which represents the boolean if whether the machine is created.

  • Method Details

    • addSlots

      public void addSlots(Item item)
      Creates a new slot where a new item will be placed.
      Parameters:
      item - refers to the item class in which it will be placed in a new slot

    • resetSlots

      public void resetSlots()
      Clear all items in every slot in the vending machine set sold and availability back to zero.

    • enterCash

      public int enterCash(Scanner input)
      This method calls the method in slots to initiate the vending machine to accept cash.
      Parameters:
      input - refers to the object that will take the input of the user in the terminal
      Returns:
      the amount for the total cash inserted

    • change

      public int change(int amount, int cost)
      This method calls the method in the vendingModel class to return the change of a user.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of cash placed in the vending machine
      cost - the price of the item bought
      Returns:
      the amount of change to be given to the user

    • setAvailableChanges

      public void setAvailableChanges(int[] availableChanges)
      This method sets the array of integer for the available changes.
      Parameters:
      availableChanges - is the array of available changes respective to the vending machines current number of bills

    • setAvailableChange

      public void setAvailableChange(int quantity, int index)
      This method sets the available change of a specific bill or coin.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the number of bills or coins to be placed
      index - to which bill of coin will be added to

    • getAvailableChanges

      public int[] getAvailableChanges()
      This method returns the array for the available change.
      Returns:
      the array of ints for the number of available change with respect to their value

    • getAvailableChange

      public int getAvailableChange(int index)
      This method returns the available change.
      Parameters:
      index - the index at which bill or coin the vending machine is referring to
      Returns:
      the number of available change based on the index

    • getSlots

      public ArrayList<Slot> getSlots()
      This method returns the slots of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      the array list of slots

    • getDENOMINATION

      public int getDENOMINATION(int index)
      This method gets which bill is referred to.
      Parameters:
      index - the index used to refer to the denomination
      Returns:
      the denomination at which the index is referring to

    • viewVendingMachine

      public void viewVendingMachine()
      This method refers to the view vending class which is responsible for the printing of various texts for the vending machine when buying or testing the vending machines features.

    • printReport

      public void printReport()
      This method prints the report to on the sales and stocks depending on the last restocking.
